title: NO TILL VS. THE PAPERPOT TRANSPLANTER

tasks.task: Using a Paper Pot Transplanter in a no-till, compost mulch garden.
subtasks: Saturating paper pot trays with water before transplanting.
Cleaning out previous crop beds.
Applying compost to the bed for the Paper Pot Transplanter.
Using a tilther to break down compost chunks.
Raking and smoothing the compost-covered bed.
Broadforking to aerate the soil and allow root penetration.
Ensuring seedlings are at the optimal size for transplanting.
Adjusting the Paper Pot Transplanter settings for soil conditions.
Transplanting seedlings using the Paper Pot Transplanter.
Managing root systems when using the transplanter after previous crops.
